onSuccess.displayText: {Player} summoned every ounce of strength and dealt the final blow. The Angel collapsed, wings scorched, its crimson greatsword shattered at his feet. Silence fell over the village, but it was short-lived. The fire had spread too far, and he could do nothing to stop it. Through the smoke, he could see the devastation, the villagers trapped or fleeing, and a heavy weight settled in his chest. Victory over the Angel had come too late to save them.
